title: CM directs to eliminate corruption, depute competent officers on important posts
content:
PESHAWAR, Feb 11 (APP):Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Chief Minister Mahmood Khan chaired a meeting of administrative secretaries here on Tuesday and instructed them to depute competent officers on important posts.
He also directed to remove elements involved in corruption and said that action would be taken against those found guilty of dereliction of duties. He also directed ministers to prepare short, mid and long term plan besides directing departments to devise a comprehensive communication strategy and added that masses should be informed about the steps taken by the government for their welfare.
He also directed taking emergency steps to end commission in Communication and Works Department. He also directed to fill vacancies in merged areas and said that development of tribal districts is among topmost priorities of the government.
He said that transparency and merit would be ensured as we are being elected to serve people and resolve their issues.
